name: LCMT
body:
### Welcome to Light Contribution Management Tool Project.

Welcome to the Light Contribution Management Tool for Maya

Current Versions:

LCMTv31.py is a stable version that works with mental ray. LCMTv320.py is the on-going version. Currently it supports:

VRay Rectangle and Sphere lights and Vray Frame Buffer if enabled.
UPDATE: Select Lights Render Elements in VRay (In the Wiki section there is a whole page explaining this new functionality New Vray Functionalities Wiki)

Here you can download the most up-to-date version of the LCMT to start using it today (on the top of the page):

![Tag](http://www.sfdm.scad.edu/faculty/mkesson/vsfx705/wip/best/spring12/nestor_prado/images/fpo/slider_04.jpg)

I'm in the process of updating this page to have the info about LCMT available to you.

In the meantime you can go to [bit.ly/lcmtv3](LCMT v3.1 Page) to see videos and read everything about it.
tagline: An easy way to manage the contribution of your lights in Maya
